title: Coast to Coast AM - 05-22-10 - The Improving Human Condition
description:
Date:
 05-22-10
 
Host:
 Ian Punnett
 
Guests:
 Matt Ridley, Peter Lance 
 


Ian Punnett was joined by the author of provocative books on evolution, genetics, and society, Matt Ridley, for a discussion on how the human condition will keep improving if we continue to share ideas and communicate. 

Investigative reporter Peter Lance appeared in the first hour with an update on Muslim cleric Anwar Al Awlaki, thought to be linked to several alleged terrorist attacks.
